trans-unit.resname: OCM1·1 | Azusa, Lost but Seeking | Card Text
trans-unit.source: You may play two additional lands on each of your turns.

trans-unit.resname: OCM1·1 | Azusa, Lost but Seeking | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I do not miss Jukai Forest. It is not my home. My home is Kamigawa, its people my family. Wherever I set my pack and rest my head, I am home."
Lifelink {R}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Brion Stoutarm deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target player or planeswalker.

trans-unit.resname: OCM1·3 | Glissa, the Traitor | Card Text
trans-unit.source: First strike, deathtouch Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

trans-unit.resname: OCM1·4 | Godo, Bandit Warlord | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Godo, Bandit Warlord enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Equipment card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Whenever Godo attacks for the first time each turn, untap it and all Samurai you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

Grimgrin, Corpse-Born enters the battlefield tapped and doesn't untap during your untap step. Sacrifice another creature: Untap Grimgrin and put a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever Grimgrin attacks, destroy target creature defending player controls, then put a +1/+1 counter on Grimgrin.

trans-unit.resname: OCM1·6 | Karn, Silver Golem | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever Karn, Silver Golem blocks or becomes blocked, it gets -4/+4 until end of turn. {1}: Target noncreature artifact becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its mana value until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: OCM1·7 | Karrthus, Tyrant of Jund | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying, haste When Karrthus, Tyrant of Jund enters the battlefield, gain control of all Dragons, then untap all Dragons. Other Dragon creatures you control have haste.

trans-unit.resname: OCM1·8 | Mayael the Anima | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {3}{R}{G}{W}, {T}: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature card with power 5 or greater from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
{2}: Create a 1/1 colorless Sliver creature token.
Her children are ever part of her.

trans-unit.resname: OCM1·10 | Zur the Enchanter | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying Whenever Zur the Enchanter attacks, you may search your library for an enchantment card with mana value 3 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: OCM1·10 | Zur the Enchanter | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Zur remained aloof from Terisiare's suffering, intent only on his own perfection.
